1: @@//gnas//de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang//de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so//skad cig gcig mngon rdjzogs sangs rgyas//rdzogs pa lani g.yo mi 'gyur /gang che dog
2: nor bur sems //de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs//dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas//res 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro //phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa //rdzogs pa la
3: gnas gnyis su med//gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i //rdo rje nor bur rdzogs par 'gyur//de chags bral las cha nyams pa//rdo rje nas nyams la rab rdzogs//slar yang gtug
4: tor du shar ba//slar yang rdo rjenor bur rdzogs//de chags bral as cha nyams pa//lus can ye shes nyams pa min //'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin //rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brdzod
5: scae par bya//dngos pa bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang bsdud pa'i rgyu yinno//srid las mya dgan 'das par 'gro /de las slar yang sridg par 'ong// rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang
6: grod pa dag las snang byed bzhin//rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'dini//s rnams kyis ni yongs rdjzogs nyid //nyi khri brgyad gnyis brga yi dbugs//'gyur med skad cig zos rnams
7: kyis//phyogs gnyis yang dag gnon pa ni//sa rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs//bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa//rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med //rnam ba bcu gnyimi sontu
8: rnams kyis//rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchog/cha shes rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems//rnam pa bcu drug ma 'gyur ba//don gcig gnyis su med pa chos//dam pa'i don te
